name: Lil Penguino And The Time Vortex
name_original: Lil Penguino And The Time Vortex
description:
In a zoo in a far off metropolis, Penguino lived his life watching the humansstand still in time, staring at him. His limited fish allowance forced him toperform for them, he knew things had to change. Using a stolen phone thatwas dropped into his enclosure to take online courses in theoretical physicsand electrical engineering, Penguino created a machine to alter thetimelines. Through his hubris he was launched to a nondescript part of thecontinuum where he must run from the temporal anomaly that seeks tocorrect the damage he has done.

Made by:

Kyle McAlinden - Programmer

Luke Jones - Artist

J. SH Johannes Hubner - Artist, Music & Sound Effects
